name: Staff of Scars
description: A mechanical staff with a cross rune carved into it. Capable of both forgiving sins or unleashing punishments.

normals.name: Normal Attack
normals.description:
While on the ground, swing the staff to attack **5** times in a row.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **33.9%** of ATK plus **203**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **25.4%** of ATK plus **152**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **41%** of ATK plus **246**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **56.1%** of ATK plus **337**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **98.8%** of ATK plus **593**.

normals.name: Soaring Barrage
normals.description:
While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack **5** times in a row in mid-air.
First Attack: Deal damage equal to **43.9%** of ATK plus **263**.
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **31.7%** of ATK plus **190**.
Third Attack: Deal damage equal to **34.4%** of ATK plus **206**.
Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to **61.6%** of ATK plus **370**.
Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to **64.3%** of ATK plus **386**.

normals.name: Moonfall
normals.description:
Tap and hold normal attack while airborne to trigger Moonfall.
Upon landing, deal damage once every **0.2** seconds, for a total of **77.2%** of ATK plus **463** damage.

normals.name: Focused Assault
normals.description:
After the third normal attack, hold the normal attack button to trigger branch attacks, consuming **300** points of endurance.
First Attack: Pull in enemies in front of the user, **strongly suspending** them and deal damage equal to **21.7%** of ATK plus **130** every **0.3** seconds (up to **4** times).
Second Attack: Deal damage equal to **25.2%** of ATK plus **151** at the target location and to nearby enemies every **0.3** seconds.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: **15** seconds. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for **0.5** seconds.

dodge.name: Surge
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short perfect dodge window (use a directional button before dodging) to trigger Surge.
Each energy pulse deals damage equal to **30.5%** of ATK plus **183** to targets.
Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

dodge.name: Tesseract
dodge.description:
Use normal attack during the short period after dodging to trigger Evasive Blast.
Fire an energy orb forward, dealing damage equal to **43.3%** of ATK plus **260** to targets in its path every **0.3** seconds (up to **5** times).
Grant **75** weapon charge points upon use.

skill.name: Sanctuary
skill.description: Create an energy shield at the Wanderer's location. Heal allies within the shield for **81.7%** of ATK plus **490** every second and reduce their damage taken by **3%** for **10** seconds. **60**-second cooldown.

discharge.name: Swift Deliverance
discharge.description: When **weapon charge** is full or **Phantasia** is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, **remove all debuffs from the Wanderer** and the staff continues to remove debuffs from the Wanderer and allies, plus heals nearby Wanderers and allies for **79%** of ATK plus **474** HP for **7** seconds.

advancements.description: Heal all teammates within **10** meters for **100%** of ATK after using a dodge skill.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **10%**.
Normal attacks also fire two missiles, each dealing damage equal to **5%** of ATK to the target and restoring **5** weapon charge points.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by **20%**.
Increase speed of obtaining weapon charge by **20%** (not applicable to missile attacks).
Grant all teammates within range **60%** damage reduction whenever a skill dispels control effects from the target.
